properties.name: outputAsFilePath
properties.description: Whether to save the output to a specified file path. Uncheck to output as binary data.

properties.name: outputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path to save the cropped media.

properties.name: outputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name to give the output binary property.

properties.name: inputUseFilePath
properties.description: Use a file path for the input media. Uncheck to use binary data from a previous node.

properties.name: inputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path to the input media file.

properties.name: inputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name of the binary property containing the input media.

properties.name: cropWidth
properties.description: The width of the final cropped area in pixels.

properties.name: cropHeight
properties.description: The height of the final cropped area in pixels.

properties.name: xOffset
properties.description: The distance from the left edge to start the crop.

properties.name: yOffset
properties.description: The distance from the top edge to start the crop.
